attributes.action: Jeremy Hunt, Investigate Cannabis for Cancer Treatment
attributes.additional_details:
There is experimental evidence available which shows that cannabis kills Cancer cells.
Health Secretary jeremy Hunt, if this is true Cannabis can save lives of thousands of cancer patients and also save the treasury millions if not Billions of Pounds that are unnecessarily pocketed by Big pharmaceutical companies.
you are kindly urged to commisssion an urgent investigation by top British researchers to verify this matter. Thousands of suffering Cancer patients will be very greatful if you respond positively to this petition. Thank you in anticipation of full and urgent investigation.
